original_text: In the third year of the reign of king Belshazzar a vision appeared unto me, even unto me Daniel, after that which appeared unto me at the first.
korean_text: 나 다니엘에게 처음에 나타난 환상 후 벨사살 왕 제삼년에 다시 한 환상이 나타나니라

sentences.original_text: In the third year of the reign of king Belshazzar
after that which appeared unto me at the first
sentences.korean_translation: 처음에 내게 나타났던 것 이후의 환상이니라
